Posts.Content: Hi you got to be brave and decilpine the SEROMA as felt carryon with the exercises maybe reduce the intake of fluids just a bit and use a Hot water bottle to soothe the seroma ( warm water in bottle) giving a break every 15 minutes for a couple of days might just do the wonders. GOOD LUCK
Posts.Title: My Seroma won't go away

Posts.Content: I found it easier to deal with the seroma though had it drained twice beared with pain and used a hot water bottle nott very hot though soothing myself by keeping the hot water bottle around armpit back every 15minutes for a few days and reduced intake of liquids, this has reduced the filling up. Of course don't ignore the exercises very important hope this can help. GOOD LUCK
Posts.Title: My Seroma won't go away

Posts.Content: Hi Sorry to hear about your health but with radiotherapy there seems no worries it's like having an x-ray don't worry about the rest it will fall in place jus be positive n rest when needed good luck
